title: travelplanner: Could you help arrange a 5-day travel plan for a group of 7, departing from Omaha and planning to visit 2 cities in Colorado? The trip is set from March 14th to March 18th, 2022. It's vital that our accommodations are pet-friendly, as we have pets with us. Our budget for the entire trip is $23,400. (893b3c125c45efaa)

always_included_messages.content:
You are a proficient planner. Based on the provided information and query, please give me a detailed plan, including specifics such as flight numbers (e.g., F0123456), restaurant names, and accommodation names. Note that all the information in your plan should be derived from the provided data. You must adhere to the format given in the example. Additionally, all details should align with commonsense. The symbol '-' indicates that information is unnecessary. For example, in the provided sample, you do not need to plan after returning to the departure city. When you travel to two cities in one day, you should note it in the 'Current City' section as in the example (i.e., from A to B).

***** Example *****
Query: Could you create a travel plan for 7 people from Ithaca to Charlotte spanning 3 days, from March 8th to March 14th, 2022, with a budget of $30,200?
Travel Plan:
Day 1:
Current City: from Ithaca to Charlotte
Transportation: Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46
Breakfast: Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte
Attraction: The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte
Lunch: Cafe Maple Street, Charlotte
Dinner: Bombay Vada Pav, Charlotte
Accommodation: Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte

Day 2:
Current City: Charlotte
Transportation: -
Breakfast: Olive Tree Cafe, Charlotte
Attraction: The Mint Museum, Charlotte;Romare Bearden Park, Charlotte.
Lunch: Birbal Ji Dhaba, Charlotte
Dinner: Pind Balluchi, Charlotte
Accommodation: Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte

Day 3:
Current City: from Charlotte to Ithaca
Transportation: Flight Number: F3786167, from Charlotte to Ithaca, Departure Time: 21:42, Arrival Time: 23:26
Breakfast: Subway, Charlotte
Attraction: Books Monument, Charlotte.
Lunch: Olive Tree Cafe, Charlotte
Dinner: Kylin Skybar, Charlotte
Accommodation: -

***** Example Ends *****

chat_history.content: Could you help arrange a 5-day travel plan for a group of 7, departing from Omaha and planning to visit 2 cities in Colorado? The trip is set from March 14th to March 18th, 2022. It's vital that our accommodations are pet-friendly, as we have pets with us. Our budget for the entire trip is $23,400.

function.name: delegate
function.arguments: {"instructions": "Search for popular attractions in Colorado that are accessible to pets and are located in two different cities. Also, search for pet-friendly accommodation for 7 people in these two Colorado cities for the dates March 14th to 18th, 2022 and their respective prices. Next, search for flight details from Omaha to these cities for March 14th."}

chat_history.content:
Here is a list of popular attractions in Denver and Colorado Springs, both of which are pet-friendly:

## Denver:
- Denver Zoo: A popular zoo with a wide variety of animals and exhibits. It is one of the top-rated zoos in the country and is known for its conservation efforts.
- City Park: A large urban park featuring the Denver Zoo, a golf course, lakes, and plenty of open space for pets to roam.
- Denver Botanic Gardens: These gardens offer a peaceful and scenic escape, with a variety of plant life and beautiful landscapes.
- Denver Art Museum: An art museum with a diverse collection of art, including indigenous and Western American art.
- Red Rocks Park and Amphitheatre: This outdoor venue is famous for its stunning red sandstone rocks and is a popular spot for concerts and events.

## Colorado Springs:
- Garden of the Gods: A natural park with breathtaking red rock formations and an iconic landscape. It offers hiking trails and is a great spot for pet walks.
- Cheyenne Mountain Zoo: This zoo is set amidst beautiful scenery and has a diverse collection of animals, including elephants, giraffes, and birds.
- North Cheyenne Cañon Park: A scenic park with hiking trails, waterfalls, and picnic areas. It's a great spot for nature lovers and their pets.
- Seven Falls: A beautiful waterfall with a historic trail leading to the falls, offering a peaceful walk with your pet.
- The Broadmoor Seven Falls: This attraction features the Seven Falls and is a popular destination for its natural beauty and the chance to see the falls up close. 

Now, let's look at some pet-friendly accommodation options for 7 people in these cities for your specified dates:

## Denver:
- Quaint & Charming 2BR + Futon: This private room accommodation can fit 6 people and has a maximum occupancy of 7. It is priced at $897 for one night, so for 4 nights (March 14th-18th), it would cost $3588.
- GORGEOUS Newly-Renovated 2-BR Flat: This entire home/apt can fit 6 people and has a maximum occupancy of 7. The price for one night is $731, so for 4 nights, it would cost $2924.

## Colorado Springs:
- Large sunny park slope apartment: This entire home/apt can fit 5 people and has a maximum occupancy of 7. The price for one night is $82, so for 4 nights, it would cost $328.
- Manhattan Midtown West 3B Apartment: This entire home/apt can fit 9 people and has a maximum occupancy of 7. For one night, it costs $1178, resulting in a total of $4712 for 4 nights.
- Quiet, sunny, renovated: This entire home/apt can fit 6 people and has a maximum occupancy of 7. The price for one night is $1013, so the total for 4 nights would be $4052.
- SUN FILLED 1BR in ARTSY FORT GREENE: This entire home/apt can fit 2 people and has a maximum occupancy of 7. The price for one night is $62, which makes the total for 4 nights $248.

Please note that the prices provided are for the specified dates and may vary depending on the exact dates of your stay and the availability at the time of booking.

Regarding flights from Omaha to Denver on March 14th, 2022, I found several options with varying prices and flight times:

- Flight F3563565: Departs at 14:37, arrives at 15:25, with an actual elapsed time of 1 hour and 48 minutes. Price: $174.
- Flight F3811050: Departs at 14:08, arrives at 14:41, with an actual elapsed time of 1 hour and 33 minutes. Price: $117.
- Flight F3811066: Departs at 16:59, arrives at 17:38, with an actual elapsed time of 1 hour and 39 minutes. Price: $162.
- Flight F3874287: Departs at 09:38, arrives at 10:19, with an actual elapsed time of 1 hour and 41 minutes. Price: $210.
- Flight F3979145: Departs at 21:10, arrives at 21:31, with an actual elapsed time of 1 hour and 21 minutes. Price: $135.
- Flight F3979146: Departs at 16:10, arrives at 16:33, with an actual elapsed time of 1 hour and 23 minutes. Price: $197.
- Flight F3979147: Departs at 06:00, arrives at 06:23, with an actual elapsed time of 1 hour and 23 minutes. Price: $103.

Please note that I couldn't find any flights from Omaha to Colorado Springs on March 14th, 2022. You may want to consider alternative dates or modes of transport.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").
current_city.title: Current City

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"
transportation.title: Transportation

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"
breakfast.title: Breakfast

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"
attraction.title: Attraction

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
accommodation.title: Accommodation

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.
city.title: City

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.
city.title: City

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.
state.title: State

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.
departure_city.title: Departure City

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.
destination_city.title: Destination City

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.
date.title: Date

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.
destination.title: Destination

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
city.title: City
